channel.title: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I need help with my server. I'm new to this and I'm pretty nooby.
Can someone please explain to me what a "hostname" is and how I can get my server public and running? I just purchased the VPS, and I can't figure out how to upload the files.
Can someone please add me on Skype? I have teamviewer too
* Skype=william.zicha

item.title: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Hi, just a quick message to say that I removed your reward offer. We don’t allow our members to offer rewards for help, help here is free!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me

item.title: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“soccer likes poo, post:4, topic:529013”]It’s glitched for me… I can’t connect to my own VPS.

I can only access my console[/quote]
Talk to your VPS providers. We don’t know how they operate, make sure you can send/receive connections on port 3394 (Default this is allowed) because that is the port for RDC (Remote Desktop Connection).
Make sure the VPS provider has opened the ports for you, or allow you access to do so.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me

item.title: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @soccer_likes_poo soccer likes poo
item.description:
@soccer_likes_poo wrote:

It’s glitched for me… I can’t connect to my own VPS.

I can only access my console

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me

item.title: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

yeah, like tuk says. Do that, when you run the server go to IP Chicken and find your VPS ip so you can change the clients IP from the client.java and others will be able to connect.

It also seems like you have downloaded and are trying to publish immediately. You should also first make changes, don’t download and then publish. Your players will complain and say there are bugs and you will have a hard time fixing and you may even lose players.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me

item.title: I need help! there will be a reward for whoever helps me
item.dc:creator: @tuk tuk
item.description:
@tuk wrote:

upload your file to mediafire/dropbox > download your server on your vps > run your server there

Read full topic
